comment_text: I wanted to love this suit SO BAD. I had to return it because it didn’t cover my butt. I am 5’6 and 158 pounds. Normally a size 10. I ordered a large. I have a long torso and typically struggle finding a one piece that’s long enough. This one was PERFECT in length. Super comfortable too. But I have been gifted on my backside and half my rear end hung out. Definitely doesn’t have full booty coverage If you have a butt. Unfortunately I have to return it. But I will say it was a fabulous suit and would probably work fantastic for any y’all woman with a small to normal sized rear end! :)

The hype is real on this one. I normally do not let reviews convince me to try an item, but the photos of these moms totally won me over, bought this for myself and was elated when I tried it on. Worth it. I am 5' 5" about 150lbs with a heavy booty that never fits into anything (and fairly large upper body with a tiny waist). Bought a size Medium. Was surprisingly perfect. I havent owned a swimsuit in ten years bc i cant stand wearing them, i am now looking for an excuse to wear this one because it feels wonderful and holds all my curves in place. TOTALLY WORTH IT! (just do not dry it, line dry!!)

I haven’t actually worn this swimsuit yet but trying it on it looks great! I do wish the shear in the middle was a little more see through but that is no big deal. Also, it does run a little small but I ordered a size larger than what I normally wear and it fits perfect and looks great!I will update post after wearing a few times if there are any problems with the swimsuit.

I am hoping this review reaches the company directly. I ordered this suit in a M in April and didn’t try it on until this weekend. Big mistake. I loved it but the butt portion did not fit me well. I ordered the size up in a different color and I love it! I’d love to exchange my first suit for the next size but my amazon return/exchange window has passed. My original suit still has all of the tags- I’d love the next size up in black.

Cute suit. If you are well endowed, be advised that the bra cups are awkwardly small (but they are easily removed). Not entirely impressed with the elastic of the suit. It seems a bit stiff like it probably won't hold up long. If you have any back flab it will be noticable in this suit. I bought this because it was available for 2 day shipping and I needed a suit for a water park party. Overall it is a decent swimsuit for the price and has an appealing design that works well for a mom-bod without making me feel matronly.

Very sexy but still modest at the same time. I know the description of this is crap due to their bigoted view of how a woman look after having children. You will just have to look past the way they have described it since they were probably using google translate anyways. The bottom line is this suit is great and fits as it should and most importantly makes you feel like a million bucks...not bad considering normally one would pay over a hundred for the same anywhere else.

The swim suit is absolutely stunning on. It covers all my flawed areas. I got a size medium I’m 4’10” 120 lbs. 34dd. My only complaint is it looks like someone’s returned item. The bag and garment look worn. The garment was rolled up and thrown in the bag and the ziplock bag was all wrinkled. For as much as i love the garment, the thought of someone else’s return is unappealing, especially for a swimsuit. I will be ordering another (hopefully) new one in a different color.

It seems weird that no matter what weight I am (currently I’m at my heaviest so I’m about a 38D), no money I spend gives me a suit that fits well after even one wear. So I was very skeptical about buying this given the price. But I read the reviews and knew it had an easy return and gave it a go. It’s beautiful! And fits me perfectly. I feel gorgeous in it, for a 40ish Mom. Don’t hesitate. It’s a great buy.

I never wear one piece suits. Ever. I’m only 5’5” bit have a long torso, so one pieces never fit right. I’m 41 with 4 children. Time for a one piece when we go to the pool with the kids. I’m a fit 5’5”, 120 lbs and the small fits great. Never have I liked a one piece so well. I just hope it holds up well.

This suit fits perfectly.  It's sexy and modest, and makes me feel like I look amazing. I'm 5'1and 165lbs and love the way it fits. I would buy multiple colors of this but want different style suits (tankini) as well, so I'm limited to only one. Love the green color. Wash before you wear to get the dye smell off. I've had no issues with it, and am now second guessing not getting another one...

It was too short, making the band at my neck/shoulder level was very tight.  The bottom openings for the legs were so large they fit half way over my butt cheeks.  Very uncomfortable.  The hook at the back of the neck was also very hard to hook up.

Big chested ladies: just buy this! This suit is supportive and attractive. I am a 36DDD, and wear a dress/pant size of 14. I bought the suit in a L (12/14). Typically the only swimsuits that both fit and support me are halter tops which dig into the back of my neck and hurt. This suit supports without putting any pressure on my neck. The fabric is forgiving around my stomach and not overly tight anywhere.The only downside is that the material is thin. I’m not sure how this will hold up against repeated use over the summer.

I am 69yrs. 5’6” and weight 127#. I ordered a small and it is perfect. Good quality and color is as described. Only issue is I have a swimmers back so my husband did not like the way the back looked. Easy fix is I left it unhooked and removed hooks. Perfect. I ordered another style on Amazon and if it doesn’t work will return it for another one of this style different color.

Can work for maternity swimwear! I bought my normal size L, but the size of my belly at 26w is pulling the suit down on my shoulders and up in the crotch area. At least I hope that's what is happening as Im 5'10 and normally 164lbs (175lbs pregnant at the moment). I'm totally in love with the design, it was exactly as pictured and well sewn. The picture was true to color.  I really wanted to wear this weekend but I'm going to have to exchange for a XL to accommodate my pregnant belly.

Love this suit!!! When I opened the box I was thrilled with how bright the blue color was. I tried it on ASAP and fit perfectly! I have an hour glass shape and it fits great on top and on the bottom. I’m 5’2”, 145 lbs., & a 38D. I ordered a medium and can’t believe how well it fits! The bottom doesn’t cut into my legs, the top provides great boob support and the material is so soft. It’s full coverage with a sexy twist. I’ll probably buy it in a few colors. Such an awesome find, perfect timing for summer!

I wanted to love this swimsuit. The colors, the price, the fit, everything about it looked amazing. Except the fit wasn't. For reference, I'm a 36DD that's breastfed two children. I'm not sure what category that leaves me in, but this lacked support, which in turn made the top look loose and frumpy. The midsection was amazing, great for hiding a soft tummy, but ultimately I had to send it back because I wasn't happy with how much work I had to put in to keep the girls in the right location.
It's a beautiful bathing suit and fits well with lots of support, but the wrong suit came. That mesh in the middle wasn't there.

This suit is sexy!  I'm 5'10 and weigh 175.  I ordered a large (12) and it fits perfect, even for a long torso.  The quality and comfort of this swimsuit is the best and I'd love to order it in other colors.

I bought this swimsuit for a trip to the indoor waterpark over the Christmas holiday.  To help my curvaceous sisters out there I wanted to leave a review because several other ladies did the same.  I am a "G" cup and this fit my top half well and looked attractive. Only downside, as some reviewers said, is the cups are like free-floating shoulder pads and offer no support.  It is true but casual use it is fine.  I need something with more support but for lounging by the pool with a few dips it is great.My hips didn't look bad and while is was slightly too big it wasn't noticeable.  The legs are cut higher than I expected so I had to do some more grooming so keep that in mind and try on before you leave.

This is a very sexy swimsuit. The green color really flatters my olive skin tone. The high neckline helps accentuate sculpted shoulders and the ruched piece helps hide belly bulge (if any).  The mesh makes it sexy but still tasteful for those that are worried about the girls hanging out.  I like that it has full coverage on the back.  The swimsuit is true to size.  I ordered a small, which is what I generally wear in all bathing suits.  If you are between sizes, I would size up.

Great for an Amazon bathing suit!  I am 33 yo, 5’8, 175 pounds. The color I picked was deep purple. I picked the fit based in size chart. I like the cut because I have broad shoulders and the halter cut was very flattering.  The color that came was a little off... I would say still in the purple color family, just more of a deep magenta. I will say that if you have cellulite in your butt, it will show some but not enough to make me feel self conscious (trust me, I am easily self conscious in a bathing suit). The mesh in front and back are a nice part of the swimsuit. Overall, solid fabric and solid clasp for the back of neck. I would buy this again in another color.  I only gave it 4 stars because the color was a little off from what I ordered.
I recieved the wrong bathing suit. The size I wanted but not anything like the the bathing suit pictured. Now I don't have my bathing suit on time for a pool party. Very disappointed.

This covers all the right areas, but has enough shape to give me the look I was going for. I'm a 38D, 5'6", 165lbs and this looks fabulous.  I can't wait to wear it publicly and see what kind of looks I get! Hot mom on a mission!

I love this suit! I can't say much that hasn't already been said, but, I'm 5 ft 4, 137 lbs, 34DDD chest, and a medium fits perfectly! I was worried there wouldn't be enough chest support, but there is! It is a nice, conservative but sexy one piece. It's my "mom" suit. I love that it isn't a granny suit. I love that my toddler and baby can't pull it down.

I ordered a green one. It is completely different. Terrible quality, terrible fit, no support, doesn't even have a Tempt Me tag. I'm super disappointed. As long as there are free returns, order it and hope for a good one.

Fit better than expected, feels reasonably substantial,  and I love the way it looks.Looking forward to pool time, its sexy without showing too much skin or making me worry that without constant adjusting I'll show more than intended. I was super hesitant because...I'm a sturdy girl and buying clothes is hard, buying swimsuits that make me feel good is like winning the Powerball

I typically size up in one piece bathing suits or they run too short and pull at my shoulders. I ordered a medium in this because it says that’s a 10-12 and I wear an 8. It’s definitely as flattering as everyone has said, but it was indeed too short for me and pulled in the back and shoulders. I liked it enough to order it again in a large - fingers crossed it fits better!

I got this as so many others indicated it fit so well and OMG, I am in Love! I ordered a 1x because I have a very large bust (36J) and wanted to make sure it fit well in the top. It is a bit larger in the waist as a result, but, it fits perfectly in the top and makes me feel sexy, without having to worry if I am going to have any issues. Very happy with this swimsuit!

This suit is really sexy and flattering.  Hides tummy well.  I am a size 8 with 36DD bust, so finding a flattering suit that still gives coverage and support is a bonus.  But the coverage for my rear is not what I hoped for.  I liked it well enough that I kept it and wore a black swim skirt over it.  If I were a few years younger, the rear coverage might have been okay, but at 59 I feel better with more full fit on bottom.

Finding a swimsuit to fit my large bust is close to an impossible task. However, this one is perfect! I hate shopping for swimsuits so I ordered several online to try them on. As soon as I put this on I knew it was “the one”! It covers enough to make me feel comfortable but shows just enough to make me feel sexy. Also first bathing suit I’ve had in a long time that wasn’t black. Love love love it. So glad that I found it!

I love the color and style of this suit! It’s modest (which is what I need for chasing my toddler around the pool) yet stylish. I was worried it wouldn’t be long enough, seeing the size chart but after reading reviews I decided to try. It’s a tad short for me, resulting in a bit more showing on my rear, but still good coverage. (I’m 5’9” and ordered the large) I got a compliment on it the first time I wore it and am happy with the design.

I really like this suit. I kept reading reviews that the leg holes were a little small but I found that the leg holes fit fine, it's the arm holes that are a little small- basically the cutout of the arm towards your back isn't quite as big as it could be to be super comfortable. However, as I wore it, it did seem to fit better, I don't know if it's that it stretched a little or I just got used to it? If the arm cutout was a little bigger, this would definitely get 5 stars from me. But even without that, it is still a really great suit. I got it in red and it looks just like the picture. Great quality especially for the price!

Pretty impressed. Went off of other reviews for size but I usually like to size up one in bathing suits especially since I am a larger bust and this seems to he the issue in many suits. I am 5'4" and roughly 185lbs. I wear a 42 DD. I bought the size 16 and plan on buying more but may be sizing up again only because of my bust. I gave it 4 stars only because I wish it fit better in my bust but overall happy.

I sent this back- I'm very picky about suits but was thrilled at price and great reviews. I can see where it would be very flattering on most people. However I'm very disproportionate with a 34G chest and a 27 inch waist, small butt, thighs and hips. I ordered a medium and it fit me in the top but gaped in the butt. I loved the color and style.

I loved this suit. As a mother of two I wanted something pretty, stylish but still reserved so I can pick up the little ones. I loved the color and the fit was really good in the places that matter to most. The problem is that I have a long torso and the straps are not adjustable, therefore I had to return it. If it had been adjustable I could have worn it and kept it.

Ok- the hype is warranted!! This bathing suit is amazing!! I ordered it because of the rave reviews but was not confident it would work for me and it did! I have a very long torso and have to order “tall” one-pieces in hopes of not looking completely 80’sBut this fit!!every part of this bathingsuit hits perfectly and really is slimming. It’s a new favorite and I may buy it in another color.5’8” size 8/10

I love this swimsuit. It provides great coverage, but also looks very sexy and stylish. I bought it in the purple color, and I got so many compliments from my husband. I would highly recommend it for women who are wanting to look great but not show off too much skin.I purchased the medium size, and I am 5'2 and 145 lbs.

Color is more of a red tone and not as “deep  purple” as the stock image(slightly upset by this). Overall fit is great. 5’2 135# and ordered a Medium. Some reviews mentions poor sewing. All seams are intact and strong. One pucker in the front where the white fabric from behind/inside the mesh shows through. Overall great suit for the price.

Honestly I looked A long time for the best bathing suit for my body. I read The reviews on this one and I’m so glad I did. It fits great. Supports what it needs to. I do Not have pictures to post but I assure You the green one I ordered is perfection. The color is exact. Fits great. I am 5’4”. 227 pounds. I wear Size 16 so I ordered the large/2x. I was Worried with such a big range it wasn’t gonna fit but it was as perfect. If u are bigger than a 16 I’m not sure this would even fit. So order up if you are...

5'7" 160lbs ordered large and it was a bit too snug for my height. I was nervous about ordering an XL given I am small chested.  Decided to give it a try as I loved the style of the bathing suit being very modest with a touch of show, and was very happy with my exchange!  The removable cups are a little large given it is an XL so I may swap them out for smaller ones from another suit but overall fit and style was exactly what I wanted.

I had put on a few pounds and was looking for a cute, but full coverage swimsuit in the back.  This was perfect!  The sheer/mesh in the front and back was everything.  It was very comfortable and I didn't have to worry about pulling on the swimsuit to make sure I am properly covered.  It even had some tummy control because you could not tell that I had put on a few pounds. Definitely recommend this swimsuit!

I liked the review on this so I purchased.  The bathing suit is very nice front is lined and the top is very cute.  I am tall and the back side rode up on me but I liked the suit so much I just made it into a tankini top so it worked for me.  I would love it if they made it in long torso or more material to cover the butt.

Just received this swimsuit and I love it! Very flattering and fit was perfect.As for sizing reference I ordered a medium and I am 5"5" 140 lbs with 34DD size chest and average size torso. I haven't swam in it yet so can't speak to how it holds up after swimming but as for look/fit, it is perfect.

This fits awesome! Conservative yet sexy. I ordered a 0x as i have a big butt and small bust so its hard to find suits that fit properly. I am 5’ 4” and about 180lbs. My only small problem is that my small bust doesnt quite fill it out so i have small bulge near the armpits but i would buy again regardless!

Love this bathing suit. I will be  ordering a second in a different color. My measurements:  5’2”, 38DD,  150lbs, short torso.  I was initially concerned with length of this at first glance, but for a short torso it fit fine.  For longer torsos, it might be a ‘stretch’.  There are removal pads for the bra section. Ordered navy- very pretty. Washed once already with no issues.

I almost don’t want to tell you all how amazing this suit is because I don’t want everyone to have it, BUT let me tell you any way - IT IS AMAZING! The fit is so good, the quality is incredible & it feels like it should be so much more expensive. It is flattering and subtly sexy. I have a large chest and I really struggle to find suits that find that happy medium between enough coverage & support & too much coverage, but this is just perfect. I sized up, and the fit is just right.

This swimsuit is very flattering.  I ordered a size up because of reviews about tight legs.  I found the legs to be looser than I expected.  The style is great.  My worst rating would be that I received a package that had obviously been opened.  This was the inside plastic surrounding the actual suit.  The outside packaging was in tact.  I will definitely sterilize it before wearing it.

Bought this bathing suit on the advice of Living in Yellow blog and the reviews on Amazon.  This suit delivers.  It is really fashionable and flattering. I am not particularly confident in a bathing suit. I carry a little extra that I am always battling to lose. I put this suit on, looked in the mirror and thought "hello you".  For the price, take the chance. I don't think you will be disappointed.  I may even buy another.

This is probably the only one piece bathing suit I have not returned. I am not evenly proportioned. I am a size 4 or waist, but have a very large chest (34G). I purchased a medium and it fit great. Keeps my girls in on top and is very flattering. I cannot wait to wear it to the beach!!  You will not regret buying this bathing suit.

I LOVE this one piece! It’s extremely comfortable and it has just the right amount of sexiness. I wore it to the beach with my family and felt so comfortable in it, I didn’t want to wear any other bathing suit. I’m 5’3 weigh 150 and got a size medium which fit perfectly. It’s amazing at making you look a little thinner too. You should totally buy this!!

I am 5'8 and 190 lbs.  I got the 0X which said it was a 14W (wide)  which was perfect for me, because I am a size 14, but I have wide hips.  I have a really hard time finding suits and other tight fitting clothes for this reason, but this suit fits me like a GLOVE!  It is absolutely perfect!!  I wanted something a little sexy, but still semi-modest, and this suit has it all!  I have never looked this amazing in a bathing suit!!

The swimsuit is cute, fits well although if I bought it again I would maybe go a size smaller as the cup size feels a little big for me. The reason why I gave it 3 stars is because I was shipped the wrong color, I ordered deep purple and was sent what I believe is purple, but has a pink or mauve tone to it. That was disappointing but I need it for a trip so will be keeping it as is. So good swimsuit, bad color shipping.

I liked this swimsuit so much once I got it that I ordered another one in a different color. After reading reviews from people and seeing what body types people were and what sizes they ordered, I ordered one. It fits perfectly! Based on the size chart, I should have ordered a large, but per the reviews I ordered a medium, and that was the right decision.  I would definitely recommend ordering this one. It's flattering all around and I have gotten compliments every time I wear it.

This suit is perfect! It is just sexy enough but still keeps the mom body tucked in. I feel like the sizing was right on. I have DD boobs this suit keeps them safely where they should be while showing a little cleavage. It is very comfortable and seems to be well-made. And I love the price! Totally worth it.

It's made well and fits like a dream. I was concerned that my bust wouldn't look as great as the picture, but it does! The padded lining gives you support and makes your bust look great. I get lots of compliments wearing this suit and feel so great in it. Highly recommend. I'm 5'8" and about 145 lbs, 34D

I bought a couple of swimsuits from Cupshe and they did not fit.. the torso was extremely short, and I’ve always been a small and every other brand has fit me. Do not order from them!  This swimsuit fits me perfectly, is very cute, and the material is thick. I wanted something modest but still cute, and something that would hide my stomach since I just had a baby a few months ago. This one is great! I am 5’5, 115lbs and ordered the small.

I never leave reviews but this swimsuit really lives up to the hype, I love it! It fits perfectly, is slimming, hides my post baby belly, and is still sexy! The material is a little lightweight so durability is to be determined, but for $28 it is definitely worth it! I’ll be buying a few more in other colors! For size reference, I’m 5’4” about 155 lbs, carrying most of my weight in my hips/thighs/butt (between a size 8/10 pants depending on the fit), and the medium fit me perfectly. I was surprised that it fit my butt since I have a hard time usually finding swim bottoms! The material didn’t dig into me at all and didn’t cause any weird bulges or rolls! Highly recommend!

I love this suit! It fits perfectly and looks amazing. I have never in my life said that about a bathing suit. It is flattering and hides the middle perfect. I am still in shock that I was able to buy a suit online and it look and feel so good. Thank you for making me feel amazing!

My daughter is 2. This is the first swim suit post pregnancy that I’ve liked how I look in it. I’m 5’10, size 20/22 and the size 20 fit just fine. I don’t have a large bust but I think it would work fine for large busted women. I’m kicking around getting another one. Super excited to wear this on our trip to Palm Springs!

Love this swimsuit. When I first got it, it was a little small, but not until you fasten the neck part, I debated exchanging it for a bigger size from small to medium, but I thought it might be too big. I washed it and stretched out the neck part a bit and it was perfect. I wore it 3 days at the beach and had no issues. If you have a larger neck or don’t like anything tight around your neck either buy a size up or find a different suit. Overall for the price this was a great purchase and I received a lot of compliments.

I wanted an age appropriate swimsuit (32) without looking like a mom that gave up. It's very pretty, fits well. I'm 5"6, 170, 44,32,44 and I got the xl.The circle lining pads it comes with are awful, I replaced them with triangle pads from a regular swimsuit and they fit fine and looked better.I'll try to come back and post a picture, but I hope my measurements help!

This is my first time wearing a one piece in a long time and my first to ever order clothing off amazon. I was so happy with this suit! I was comfortable and held me tight in all the right places. The cup pads worked fine for me after some adjusting. I felt confident and a little sexy in, yet comfortable enough to swim and chase my daughter. I wore it at beach and for a pool day and got lots of compliments on it. I will order again!For reference: i'm 5'2 and 215 pounds and carry most of my weight in my lower stomach and legs. I am a 38 D chest. I ordered an XL and it worked fine. I think I might could've gone up just to have some more lose fit in the stomach and maybe a more ruching effect, but not absolutely necessary.

Ok, I’ve tried them all. No suits except for a few have been able to hold me in. And the best part is that it’s a head turning bathing suit! I’m 5’7” 155 and a 36 f or g. Bras alone are hard enough to buy, but this suit holds it all in place. I’m not going jogging in it, but I’ll look good getting in and out of the pool.

Love this bathing suit! It's comfortable and fits well.  It doesn't fully cover your butt, but it covers enough that it doesn't ride up or show your entire butt. Has padding in the chest area that don't really do anything,  especially if you have larger breast,  so I removed them and it still looked great.

Never in a million years did I think I would purchase a bathing suit from Amazon and certainly not w/o trying on...this arrived today. Really good quality for the price and it’s is super cute and flattering!  I had looked at this several times and finally just clicked purchase! I am long waisted, and busty, I'm usually a size 12 or large (5'6, 165, 36D) - bought the XL to be on safe side and could've easily worn the large so I'd say TTS! May purchase 1 more!

I'm a mom of 2 and my 2nd child was delivered by a c-section. I have not been able to get rid of the dreaded mom tummy and very self conscious of it. I gave this bathing suit a try because I still want to feel sexy but covered. This bathing suit is amazing!!! I weigh 150 lbs and short at 5'3 and bought a medium and this bathing suit makes me feel great. So flattering. I bought it in black and pink and plan to buy duplicates to have as backups. LOVE!!

I’m 5’11”, 150lbs so naturally finding a one piece is very challenging with my extra long torso. Read a few reviews from people 5’9+ and had hoped I’d have the same experience. Unfortunately this suit was too short for me. I am keeping it because I like the design and color, and I can wear swim shorts to mask the fact that it’s too short :)
5'6, 225, 42DD and I got the 16W, which is my normal clothing size. Suit runs 1-2 sizes small.

The swimsuit was so cute, I wore it while on vacation, loved it so much I didn’t wear my other one I took with me.  Unfortunately though the elastic started to fray in the mesh areas.  It will still work at the home pool but not one to wear in public- it looks like I have fuzzies on the sides.

I read somewhere that this suit was the perfect one piece and they were not kidding. I LOVE THIS SUIT! It covers the tummy in all the right places, is just enough show for the chest area, and isnt tight around the legs. I am a 34 DD, 5'5, 149 lbs and I got a Medium in the pink/fuschia! LOVE LOVE LOVE!

I am into red bathing suits, and I needed a new one that was cute, sexy, and didn't hurt my neck (my boobs are soo heavy) - this one fit the bill perfectly. It is so cute and sexy - I got compliments immediately at the pool from total strangers. I'm going to buy another one in black.Oh, I'm a size 10, curvy - the large fit perfectly.

This swimsuit is stunning and super flattering! I would normally wear a large but I ordered an XL to ensure it would fit my chest and it’s perfect!!!  I would suggest sizing one up if you are curvier.

I was extremely skeptical about ordering a bathing suit from the Amazon.  Bathing suit shopping is not something I particularly enjoy.  I ordered exactly what size I thought I should and it fits amazing!  I could not believe how flattering the style is. This is the first not black bathing suit I have had in over 10 years!!

Heavily disappointed in this swimsuit after hearing SO many good things about it. Warning to ALL TALL LADIES: you need to size UP. This swimsuit was made for a short torso. Exchanging now. The only reason I didn't give it 1 star is because it's a flattering fit...it's just soooooo not made for tall women. And I'm only 5'9".

Swimsuit is amazing I ordered this for my 56 year old mother ( she is normal a 12 and I ordered her a large) who was hesitant on ordering online I said worst case it doesn't work we could always return it. Well she loved it so much I ordered another one in a different color, she feels slimming, comfortable and right out amazing in this swimsuit. I would recommend this to everyone.

Great modest one piece that's very flattering and comfortable.  Color and style just as pictured.  Quality not spectacular (stitching and elastic feel a lil weak), but really good for the price.  I've paid more than double for suits of equal quality.  Taking it on a cruise, I'll update if it holds up better or worse than expected.

Bought this for a more modest but still cute swimsuit. Fits the bill perfectly. It's a little low on the thighs for my liking but does not cut in and create lines/indent in the upper thigh. Fits well dry and wet (sometimes suits stretch/sag when wet). The ruching is a nice addition, can arrange it to cover any small tummy bumps. Overall, very nice modest but fun suit for the price. Would love if it came in some patterns, would totally buy another one.

It's snug at my armpit and neck and does not support my breasts. I ordered a 0X, which was supposed to fit like a 14W. I could get it on, without a problem, but it was not flattering on me. The material seems like a good quality and it's a cute style... just not for me. I am 5'4, 225lbs, wear 40C bra, XL to 2XL shirts, and 14 pants. I will be returning.

I'm thrilled with this swim suit. It is very good quality and fits great. I shopped Macy's and they wanted $70 - $90 for a swimsuit of this quality. Very sexy, stylish and if FITS! PS I ordered the black and white one that pops up with this one, it too fits great - same manufacturer.

I love this suit. I ordered a size up because of the short torso reviews. I normally wear a medium,  but ordered the large. It fits perfect, no pulling or tugging on it at all. I'm 5'2" and weight about 152lbs, I have an athletic build and wear a D in a bra. The suit is beautiful and the fabric is nice. I ordered black and I'll be ordering a green one when large is back in stock.

I know the reviews for this swimsuit are great. But, it didn’t work out for me. I ordered my usual size. Could’ve gone up a size for a better fit. But, I felt like the style just didn’t look very flattering on me. Disappointed ... I wanted to love it. Sadly, I returned it and didn’t reorder.

Finally a sexy swimsuit you can actually swim in. This suit fits well in all the right places. I love the cut and the mesh makes it sexy without revealing too much. And you can move around in it with fear of a wardrobe malfunction. My only complaint is the breast pads, which are a little small, but not enough of an issue to lower my rating.

Great bathing suit for the price it is a bargain. Good material. Very comfortable and stretchy. I am 5'5, 148 lbs and got a L. My measurements are 36, 30, 37. It is modest yet still sexy. Covers up well without making me feel like a grandma. The front part is forgiving on my not so flat tummy. i got the blue. Would recommend.

So i bought this for a beach trip. I have gained a few pounds and wanted Some thing that would cover the fat but still look sexy. I wasnt sure wat size to order im 5'4 155lb and i ordered large. It was a lil big but i think it will wrk.

This swimsuit is very flattering and fits just as I would hope so.  I will say that I am a 42DD and am always hesitant to purchase swimsuits via the internet. I usually wear XL size 18-20 (in Walmart clothes (lol)) I was pleasantly surprised at how well this swimsuit fit me, especially up top. I read the reviews and felt like it might be a good one to try. Looking forward to wearing this for the summer. If you are a bigger busted woman I would recommend this swimsuit for you.

I'm confused at the cut of this suit. Maybe I just got a bad one, but the bust area created major side boob with limited coverage. The butt area is really high cut, making it nearly a thong on me, and I have no butt so this isn't a typical issue. Will be returning as it is not flattering on the likes of me.

Im only giving this 4 stars because after read one some of the reviews I ordered a medium and its a bit tight around the top not super uncomfortable, hoping it will loosen up a bit after some wear. Overall happy with the purchase. Fit wise it hides "the mom belly" after 2 kiddos. Covered my butt well and cute with the mesh like top. Im 5'5 140 and 36 C.

This swimsuit is gorgeous. I feel like I could put on a long skirt and wear it as a ball gown. I want to go to a fancy poolside party and wear this. I haven't worn it in water yet, but it feels supportive and I don't anticipate any problems. I'm not going to wear it to swim laps because I don't want to ruin it in the squeeze machine!

I really wanted to love this suit. It's adorable, and sizing was spot on.....however the point of a one piece is to cover and accentuate and the rear of this thing was tiny. It was more of a "cheeky" look than anything else so back it goes.

I love this swimming suit. The color is amazing I got the blue it fits perfectly. The neck is connected with a metal fasteners. I love everything about it and the price was pretty good.  I love the neckline of this swimming suit and the routine around the stomach is very flattering. Works well if you have a larger chest.

This is the cutest swim suit I have and even though it’s a one piece, I feel absolutely sexy in it. I’m 5’4 between 125-130, 34D and the small fit just right. I’m not very hippie so my stomach doesn’t look as flat as girls with wider hips do so the scrunchy design on this covers it so well. I love this so much! Super pretty. Covers booty well too.

I bought this suit and it arrived today. The neck kinda feels like when you wear a halter, except not the weight of your entire chest on the knot you tie it up with. It has good coverage and the material has the perfect coverage/stretch to it. I've only worn it to try on so I don't know what it will be like in the pool, but it does fit comfortably. I typically can never find a suit that fits both my top and bottom and this one fits both.

I bought this swimsuit after reading an article listing it as one of several top-rated swimsuits. I don't see why; the fabric is flimsy and cheap, and while it fits, it doesn't flatter. I think that's because when the fabric is such poor quality, nothing looks right. I've returned it.

ORDER THIS NOW!! I was hesitant to order online and after reading reviews and the sale for the purple in my size,  I got it...and it's perfect!! Fits great, flattering and sexy at the same time. I am 5'3, 130lbs, 34DDD,  size 5/7 jeans and ordered size Medium for reference.

Loved it on and it fit great.  I wet a small area to test for see-throughness and it was totally see-thru.  This is going back.  I'm going to order in a darker color as I liked the suit on.  For reference - ordered a large.  I usually buy 10-12 size pants and medium tops.  5'6" and about 160 lbs.

The Material is ok, for the price. However if you’re a DD and above this swimsuit isn’t for you. There isn’t enough support for the breast of you are busty. Which translates to the breast dragging the material down (even though there’s a clip at the back). The swimsuit is not designed to have enough space to hold it all together to avoid spillage on the sides. The color is nice, just as you see in the picture. But please save yourself the disappointment and go for something that is more accommodating. The padding is awkwardly placed and not removable.

best one-piece suit i’ve ever bought. top doesn’t flatten you like a pancake and the ruching around waist is perfect. the legs, however are slightly tight. perhaps they’ll loosen over time, but they’re tight upon first wear. otherwise beautiful. i bought it in three colors!

This is a really nice suit. Well made, nice details, and beautiful deep blue. I am 5’6”, 120lbs, 32B and narrow hips. Unfortunately the Small (4-6) was too big on me and I had some loose material around the crotch and hips. I wear a size 25 pants. Wish it worked, but it had to go back!

I love this suit! After seeing all the pictures other women had uploaded I went for it and was not disappointed! It fits so well, I normally am a 10/12, ordered a large and it fit perfectly. The high neck line is super flattering and the high back also disguises any back fat. This suit is perfect, as a mom I needed something with support and also that won't come down or slip off when playing in the water with my toddler! Also it makes my boobs look amazing so its a clear winner. Never bought a suit online, I would buy again from this company in a heartbeat!

This is a great bathing suit for curvy, busty women.  Base your size off your bust size.  Fits well & figure flattering.  I wore this in the Caribbean &. Swimming pool.  It fits well, didn’t sag & dried well.  Beautiful teal color!! I highly recommend!!  Very low price for the quality.

I detest bathing suit shopping. After reading reviews, figured I would give it a shot. It is very flattering, it accentuates the bust and slims the waist. 5'2 143 lb and I bought the medium, it was perfect, love it! Will see how it holds up but at this price, I dont mind buying a couple times!

Saw this swimsuit on the TODAY show website and I was intrigued...read the reviews, saw the pictures. For the price, I wanted to give it a shot. Received the black swimsuit yesterday and it is beautiful!! The fit is great (I would suggest going up a size - I normally wear an 8 but went up, as suggested by the reviews, and it fit perfect!) No trying on suits in poorly lit dressing rooms, no walking out of stores feeling like you will never get a new suit - ladies, this is the ONE!

I love that this swimsuit is sexy without being too revealing.  I usually wear a 16/18 and ordered this in an xxl(18) and I’m glad I did because the leg holes are smaller and I am heavier on the bottom. I purchased to wear on our honeymoon cruise and so glad I did! Only thing I don’t like is the fabric does feel a little cheap but for the price it’s wonderful ☺️

LOVE LOVE LOVE this suit! So flattering. I can't even tell you the number of great reviews. The rouching on the stomach hide a lot. It fits well around the legs (doesn't create any muffin top situations. The mesh is super cute and a little sexy, while still being fully covered and no need to worry about falling out. I've bought 3 I'm so pumped about them.

Love this, I’m not one that likes to order clothes online because I’m scared they won’t fit the way I like but trying to find a swimsuit out of season was getting hard. I ordered this and I’m in love!! It’s a nice fit, I’m 5’8 and it’s works with my length. Imma curvy fit and I look great in this! Definitely worth the buy!!

Good fit. Boyfriend likes it. Took it on a cruise and wore in pool several days and on beach/in ocean. Seems to be holding up well for the money. Is getting some fuzzy's on the derriere (like other clothes when getting worn out or maybe from sitting on non-smooth surfaces) but overall satisfied with this purchase :)

I bought this for kiteboarding.  I needed something that would hold everything in place  but I didn't want a boring sports swimsuit.  This one is awesome, super sexy while still covering everything up and staying in place even when I smash against the water while learning how to jump.  Great little piece!

This swimsuit is really beautiful.  It was such a hit when three of us wore it to our girls getaway, all the other ladies jumped on amazon and order a few for each of them as well.  It is super flattering.  The pink is a Medium (regular dress size is a 12-14), the green is also a medium (regular dress size is an 8-10) the dark purple one is an XL because of her chest size, but it fit and covered amazingly on all of us.  Plus it is very secure and fitted but comfortable. The materials is not cheap or floppy at all.  I now own 5 of them because I love all the colors!!!

I haven’t gone swimming in this but I LOVE it! Super flattering and sexy. I’m 5’9” 155lbs I carry all my weight in my boobs and mid section I got a large fits great! I’m very particular about how things fit so I ordered 3 highly rated swimsuits and this is the only I kept.

I am 165 lbs and the XL is perfect!  This is a very beautiful one-piece swimsuit. Theshade of green is the kind of green i love. It makes your breasts perky bcuz of the right fit and the mesh makes it discreet and secured. I am very happy with this purchase. If it has an orange and bright red, i’d buy them all!!!
I’m sending it back only because I think it’s a little too young- looking for me ...I didn’t notice the cutout in front when I ordered....

I bought this suit to be cute and sexy, while also being full coverage and a simple design so I wouldn't have to worry about anything coming undone, showing, or moving while chasing my little one at the pool. Very nice material and fit for the price. Super impressed!

I am really happy with this suit! I purchased the olive green and love it. I have a hard time finding suits that fit my curves and short waist. I am 5’3” 36D 155 lbs and I went with a medium. The butt coverage is a little cheeky so be aware if you are not comfortable with that. The top and waist fit perfectly. I feel appropriately covered for my age but still sexy.

I wanted to love this suit, the top is so well fitting and super sexy. But the bottom went up higher than I the picture let on. I normally wear a l and the bottom hit alittle higher than expected. I kept it to use in my private pool but I cant see me wearing it out on the beach

Great suit! I agree with the other reviews that the leg holes are a bit tight but definitely not uncomfortable. Perfect amount of coverage balanced with the mesh and cut out back that gives it the perfect amount of style! I have large breasts and it fit well!

this swimsuit was great when I first got it. but after one wear it had faded so bad. i have included before fading pics also to show the color. so sad because it’s such a cute suit. i will say I also have it in black and it hasn’t done this.

This suite is even better in person. I did read reviews about going up 1 size due to the legs being tight. I am 5'10 155lbs 34D. and I normally am a M and ordered L.. It is perfect. The stomach area has just the right amount of ruching (if that is the right word). Now I want all the colors.

This was a awesome fit swimsuit. I ordered a large and it was perfect. The color was nice. The mesh in the front is perfect with the right amount of sexy. I did feel the neck was a little snug but nothing major. I will order another color for my next trip.

Usually a Medium just about everywhere, dress size 10, I bought a Large in this and it fits well.  My only gripe is that it came so stuffed into a plastic sleeve that the removable cups in the bra are creased from packaging and unusable as they stick straight out and are totally visible.  I will have to find other cups to replace them (thankfully I could remove the bad ones easily).  If it had been folded cup into cup this would not have happened... so hopefully they read this comment.  Otherwise I'm happy with it for the price.

I feel so beautiful in this swimsuit. I'll definitely be wearing it for a second summer. It still looks perfect after being the only suit I wore last summer. The elastic on the leg could be a little looser, but it's definitely not going to deter me from giving it five stars. I've never had a swimsuit that I liked more than this one.

This is the perfect swimsuit for mommas who just had a baby!! It has the perfect room for breast feeding and it hides the "baby fat" my husband loves this swimsuit on me! I can't wait to wear it for our trip this weekend!! Perfect fit! Great buy! Definitely recommend!! I'll probably be buying another in a different color!

I was concerned about the fit since I haven’t bought a suit for quite a long time. But this suit fit me perfectly. Even the bust fit fine which is what I was worried about. Also I had no problem getting it latched in the back which was mentioned in another review. I have dexterity issues but I had no problem with this suit.

I love this bathing suit. It fits so good & made me feel so beautiful! I ordered a Medium. I’m about 160lbs & 5 even. I have butt & hips & a stomach. The bathing suit hid my stomach & made me look very slim. I want more!! Also I have big boobs bc i breastfeed & as you can see from the pictures it fits my breast well!

I’m updating my review with a higher rating because the company immediately contacted me to correct the issue. Good customer service goes a long ways!The bathing suit is adorable and fits great. Unfortunately, it has an awful smell to it, right out of the package. Almost skunk like and I’ve washed it 3 times which has not helped the smell one bit. Disappointed

Cute suit, however I wore the suit for two hours sitting by the ocean, applying sunscreen and resting and I noticed the netting tore on the chest right on the seam. Can I return it? I love the suit but I think it was a defect and not something I caused.

I purchased this suit and although very lovely online, it was a little small. The top fit well but the bottom portion of the suit was very tight. I purchased a medium. I am 5’0 and 123lbs with 34D cup. I chose to returned the suit rather than get a bigger size since the cut of suit was not flattering on my 38inch hips. However it may fit well on someone less curvy.

I’m  175 lbs  and bought the large size in black. It is a nicely made flattering bathing suit. However, if ur looking for more rusched pleats in the abdomen area this is not the right suit for u. Although, it does have an inner liner that holds stomach in /support. I like the back of the suit-it covers any back area that usually sticks out.

Very happy with this purchase.  Very flattering cut.  It covered my bum completely and I have quite a lot going on back there!  I'm about 5'2 and 160lb - I'm not busty but have a belly, bum and thighs.  I really enjoyed the fit covering all of me and not worrying about something hanging out.!
Product arrived dirty and used. It is fraying in places and has food and dirt spots on it. Absolutely disgusting!!!!!!!!

Great Fit! I love this bathing suit. It looks awesome on me and I have a little bit of a pudge but you could never tell with this fabulous suit. I’m highly satisfied and I’ve even gotten compliments on it. Very pleased! Side note Im 5:4 170lbs and I believe I ordered a large. This info helped me out a lot and I hope it helps others.

I love this suit!  I am curvy, wear a size 14/16 and got the 14 plus.  It’s perfect.  I swim laps and not only do I not worry about ‘falling out’ of it, but I feel good in it!  Highly recommend!  Recommended today to a group I’m in and everyone is getting them!

This suit fit perfectly!!!  Covers well and very rich looking. Only problem is hooking the back!!!  But I love it!  I am 5’3”, 144 lbs and 38 D bust!  Took pads out by the little slit in bustline because I didn’t need them!  Bought a large.

BUY THIS SWIMSUIT! Oh. Em. Gee. I love this bathing suit so much! It fit perfect. I have a large chest, but am sort of slender everywhere else and I'm self conscious about bikinis. I bought this to wear to a friends pool party for her daughters birthday. I got a ton of compliments. Very good quality and a great price! You will love it!
This bathing suit is exactly everything the reviews said it is! I had been looking at it for months and I finally decided to order it! I absolutely love it! I can’t wait to wear it!!!

I received this suit very quickly and the style I’d cute and flattering.  However, it was inside out in the package which makes me believe it was returned and not inspected.  It also arrived with a hole in the mesh in the back. It also arrived appearing dirty with hair and white specs on it (see pictures).  On top of that it smelled like cigarette smoke.  Definitely returning!!!  Will think about trying again since it is a flattering suit but not sure yet.

I hesitated buying a swimsuit on Amazon but this suit was amazing.  I always wear a tankini because one piece suits never look right on me. This suit has the perfect fit. Makes you look slimmer as well. I would actually wear it with jeans as a top.I bought one in blue as well.

Saw this of Sarah Rae Vargas youtube, and had to try! I love it. The fit is huggy and forgiving. The style is sexy and the color is just right. Very happy. Fyi, measurements are 37, 35, 39, 165 lbs. 5'6. Ordered an XL. I'm an xl on top and a L on bottom.

This was a very flattering suit for this 40 year old mom of three. The sheer panels give the impression of sexiness without revealing much, if that makes sense. I'm 5'5" and a size 8 and it fit me perfectly. It's a nice alternative to a matronly black one-piece that I usually wear.

I'm 5'7, 38D and 150#  I originally started with a L but the body of the suit was too short. I liked the style so although I wear a size 10 in jeans, a med to large in tops, etc I went ahead and ordered the XL.. I'm glad I did. Fits well...not too big like I thought it might be. I haven't worn it yet but will update after my vacation to Hawaii.

Love this suit! I bought the medium in the first place, I’m 5’3” 121lbs but it was too tight for me. It made my bum look funny because the material was too tight and the straps at the top cut into my neck/shoulders. I then bought the Large and it was perfect. Very flattering!! I got lots of compliments! Sexy but not too sexy and I can run around with my kids without feeling like I’m going to fall out! Get this suit totally worth the money!

I gave this a 4 out of 5 stars mainly due to the sewing quality. There were threads hanging out and one seam was stitched in farther than the other side. I'm 5'5" 165lbs and 34DD and ordered a large. It is a little snug through the bottom and mid-section. There is ample coverage in this suit with no cheeks hanging out. The chest stays in place pretty well and has padded cups, which I think may be removable. It adds a little sexy to a swimsuit while still covering all the right areas.

Haven’t tried this suit out in the water yet but so far I love it. I weigh 123 lbs and I’m about 5’6”. The small fits me very well, though I’d love if there were another half inch of material in the rear end. My boyfriend says otherwise. :) The red is gorgeous and I may order a black one as well.
I got a large in black and I'm 5'6" and 165 lbs and it fits! Love it! So glad I got it!

I - of course - ordered bigger than my clothing size and I'm glad I did. For a swimsuit it doesn't seem like it has alot of give. However it covers well and is very flattering for my 5'5", slightly plump, curvy figure!

This bathing suit fit and was flattering! The support for the chest is minimal (it has small cups in it) but to me it was just enough! True to size. I struggled for months to find a bathing suit i liked that was still somewhat sexy at the same time and this suit was perfect

This suit is amazing. I'm a 36C, 5'4 and 150 lbs. I got the medium. Fits perfectly. I always have an underwire in my suits. This suit does not have one, but my girls look great! And perky! Holds my tummy in and I can still breathe!

Ordered a size large. I am 5 foot 3.5 inches tall. I weigh 145lbs and am athletically shaped (bigger hips, smaller bust). I currently wear a size 6 or 8 depending on the brand for bottoms and smalls/4 for tops (36/B). I wanted a bathing sure that was a bit camouflaged in the belly area because I have IBD and sometimes get this 3-5month prego bloated look. I also wanted to a cute, but sleek, one piece for swimming at the gym. I ordered a sun hat and a cute sheer black sarong to use on the beach! For the money, this is so cute without looking matronly.

I'm 5'4" and weigh 150 and the large fit pretty good. Love the red color, it's slimming, flattering, and classy, but doesn't make me look 'squatty' like the black does per my husband. Would definitely buy again. Rated 4 starts because the coverage on the butt is not as much as I'd like. We'll see what happens when it gets wet. I tried the XL and it fit, but I chose to stick with the large because the coverage was the same in the butt, and most swim suits stretch when wet and I decided the XL would sag.

This swimsuit is a must have!! Sexy enough for you to feel great in it, & modest enough to wear around children... just what I was looking for! It’s made very well.. the material is stretchy & comfortable. The chest area is padded which I love because honestly, nipples exposed isn’t the most attractive.lol

I loved this bathing suit. I purchased it due to an article on people.com and so many positive reviews and now its one of my favorites. I am a mom and my body changed after having a baby and im way more self conscious but this bathing suit makes me feel sexy while covering up my stomach. I am normally a size 12 or 14 and got a 0X and it fit perfectly. Definitely recommend it!!!
I have a long torso so one pieces and I aren't usually friends but this fits well! I am 5'6, 165lbs and got a large.

I have never been brave enough to order a swim suit online but the great reviews gave me hope! Needed for holiday at great wolf and this is a winner. I’m a size 14 and 200lbs the xl fit just right for more stretch order a size larger then you need.
Skimpy and thin material - didn't fit well and wasn't comfortable. Not great for ease of swimming or looks on the beach. Black covered up look would be hot in the sun. FAIL.

Just what I was looking for! Perfect for postpartum. I’m 5’4, 145 lbs and 8 weeks postpartum and I needed a suit that was comfortable, covered my belly, but wasn’t sooo conservative and this was great! Comfortable with a side of sexy.

After trying two other navy suits and returning them, I ordered this one based on the reviews. It was a good decision. I love the way this fits, and it is very flattering. I typically don’t wear such high necklines-too constricting- and ended up loosening this one by letting out the end that hooks, which helped. I recommend this suit.

I'm a solid medium in clothes, smaller (ish) boobs- B cup, size 6 in pants.  I have an athletic build and this suit fits PERFECTLY.  It IS a bit narrowly cut in the butt, but this is more the style these days.  I absolutely love this suit; I've never bought a suit on Amazon and was a little skeptical, but this fit perfectly.

This is the MOST Comfortable slim wear I have ever worn.  I am 5'3" tall and way 150 lbs. I ordered a large.  When I received  the slim wear it looked so small I was sure I ordered the wrong size, but when I tried it on, EUREKA!!! I am ordering more

This suit is great! I am 5’8” and 160lb. I first ordered a large, which was definitely wearable, but I have a very long torso and also ordered an x-large which I like better. I wear a 34DD. The top is great but larger boobs should also fit in an XL. I was worried you would see too much boob through the sheer part but it’s perfect. My butt is a little big but not really big and not very firm. I could use a little more butt coverage but it’s not creeping up crack or anything.

I typically spend $100+ on suits, but the quality is on point and my suits always last. The material on this suit is sub-par. I would guess that after a few swims it will not hold up well. More for fashion than function. Cute style though.

I ordered this product in wine red and the colour and style were exactly as pictured. I love it. I plan to wear this as a top rather than as swimwear. There is padding at the bust but thankfully its removable because those pads are not the same shape as these boobies!

I ordered a medium and am exchanging for a large. I am 5’6”, 140 pounds, B chest. The medium fit, but the length of the suit was not long enough for me so it made it a little tight. Otherwise, I love it and so does my husband!

This bathing suit is excellent.  Enough of coverage but still sexy.  It seems to be a bit tight fitting in the neck area so I don't know if ordering a size up would help or not.  I ordered two of these, one in black and one in red.  They do not fit exactly the same.  The black one is tighter in the neck than the red.  But I will still wear them.  It is not that annoying.  This suite looks good on any body type.

I purchased the teal color it is just beautiful.  The fit is great the price is right.  I’m 5’6 155  my measurements are 38 ddd 33 W and 39 hips.  When buying a 1 piece it’s hard to find one that fits on top and will be tight enough at the bottom.  This worked

I'm a petite person (5'3" or 160cm). So I thought meyba the swimsuit torso will be too long, but I was pleasantly surprised to say that it fit perfectly. I ordered a size L because I'm a 36 D, and my breasts are comfortable and secure. All good. I had absolutely no problem with the fit at all. I just hated the breast pads, they are basically useless.

I was worried this suit wouldn't fit but at this price and the positive reviews gave it a shot and was SUPER happy with it. The fit is perfect and as described. Wouldn't change a thing about it and now Im thinking about buying a 2nd one in a different color.

It is a very nice swimming suit and the top pads are nice , the material is thick enough.I had ordered a XS, for reference I’m 5’7” , 122lbs. It is a little tight in length but I’m still keeping it, so if you are tall size up would be a good option. Fast deliver

This suit is extremely flattering. I think if you have a very large chest you might not love it - I am a D cup...maybe DD in some bras and this fits fine but I have to "re-adjust" occasionally. But it's so beautiful I really don't mind.

This bathing suit is EVERYTHING! Ridiculously comfortable and it fits perfectly! I get so many compliments when I wear it! It's so flattering and hides what you need it to! I like it so much I recently bought it in another color.

I loathe the bathing suit but have no fear wearing this. Aside from the padding being a little funky, it really does hide the extra love handles. Comfy as well. Although I slightly prefer the Zando Women's Tummy Control Swimsuit Mesh Vintage Ruched Swimwear Strappy One Piece, this is a plus!!!

I have recently gained a lot of weight due to a new medication I've started & its taking a lot to get used too.. I haven't owned a one piece since i was a kid  & I would have NEVER imagined myself buying one at age 25 lol but I'm glad i did. I really like this bathing suit, It fits perfectly other than being just a little bit bigger in the chest area. I ordered the 14 ( 0X ) based on another woman's review who was about the same size as me. I'm 5'9,  200lbs and i typically wear M/L in shirts and 12/XL in pants.
I like this suit and wish I could keep it but it runs small.  But it's a nice, slimming, slightly sexy look - especially for a sixty year old woman!

I LOVE THIS SWIMSUIT! Definitely read the measurements, just to make sure you 100% have the right size. Mine was exactly the right size, and has held up for 6+ months! This is a great quality swim suit, and it looks/fits fantastic! I get TONS of compliments when I wear it!!

This swim suit is so pretty! I never expected to feel so secure, confident, and sexy in swimwear. This really exceeded my expectations. The neck clasp is a bit hard to deal with, but that’s my only complaint. I’m around a size 12 and ordered a size L.

Wore on vacation with my husband for our anniversary. Sexy without the bare skin; I felt comfortable and my husband liked that I was still showing off the girls. I especially love the back mesh detailFor reference: 38DD, size 12/14Wearing size L in suit comfortably

I love this suit. Its flattering and comfortable. Hides imperfections. Not a ton of breast support, but good for not having underwire. So far my favorite one piece. I'm 5'6 and 175lbs and a large fit perfect. Hope this helps!

I love this suit everywhere... except in back. 5’10” and I’ve tried this swimsuit in two sizes. In the end, there’s just not enough coverage in back while chasing after kids. Really nice otherwise! If they changed that one aspect, I’d buy it in every color.

This suit is seriously hot. Im sure the tan lines will suck but I'll be in the shade so I dont care. Usually I buy a size bigger because I have a large bust,  but I bought it in the size below as well and that one fits perfectly. I'll probably keep the bigger one in case i dont feel like sucking in my stomach

I am 6', 200 lbs.  The 1X was a bit too big and loose so very little breast support although I did like the bum coverage.  The suit is well made and good quality. However, I found the high neckline strap uncomfortable and choking so even if it had been the right size, I doubt I would have kept it..

This Baiting suit is awesome it does such a wonderful job with my figure I am 63 years old grandmother of seven and I’m telling you I look like a hot mama it is so beautiful it’s certainly give you the curves that you need and I would buy another one in a minute in a different style

I am 5'1 and 122, large C cup. I read the reviews and decided to get the medium. A small would probably fit but the legs holes and chest area might have been a bit tight. The medium is a little loose around the tummy(meaning that this suit has plenty of strech) but it does not hang off or look bad. The mesh looks good and the suit dries fast.

Found the same suit for $12 on Walmart. Kinda disappointing I found it cheaper after buying. The suit is super cute! I just think I ordered too big. I’m a size 18, 40DDD and carry my weight pretty evenly. I ordered a size 18 and honestly could have gone down a size. It slipped on no problem (too loose, aren’t you suppose to squeeze a bit into swimsuits? Haha) and the chest isn’t tight enough to provide support, I’m not looking for a Janet Jackson Super Bowl moment lol. I love the suit & think I’ll order a 16 in a different color.
Love this suit. I’m 5’7 160lbs 36DD andI’m wearing a large. Glad I decided to go up a size, it fits perfectly.

Oh my goodness, this bathing suit is everything I was hoping for! I ordered a large since I usually buy 8/10 and was hoping for enough room. It was definitely the right fit. There was enough room for my thighs as well and nothing felt snug in the wrong places. The top part was flattering and had a good fit. I also loved the color and the mesh. I can highly recommend this! To help other ladies, I'm 5'6, 155 lbs. and 36C.
This bathing suit fits perfectly. I bought a medium. I wear a size 8 in jeans, Medium in tops, weigh 145lbs 32G or 34 DDD bust. Love this suit, very flattering and has enough support at the top.

Very nice material and the fit was excellent. I ordered size M (5'6", 133 lbs.) and it fit perfectly. Unfortunately with my body shape (apple)  I didn't think it looked great on me so I returned.  I still highly recommend this suit!

So highly rated but there's no chest support! I guess this will work if you're a D-cup or smaller but I was very disappointed. Returned right away - overall fit was fine but with no support, it was not worth keeping.

Fits and flatters all over. I would have never purchased but someone else recommended and so I decided to try it. I am in love. This is my new favorit suit. I am in between sizes and bought the size up it fits perfect.

I bought this bathing suit last minute before vacation. It's awesome, very flattering, and my most comfortable bathing suit. The only thing was the clasp was kind of screwed up, but it doesn't stop me from wearing it and I still love it for the price. Also, no one else really posted about that, so I'm sure it's not likely to happen repeatedly.
